disabled.description: Prevents Popconfirm from appearing when clicked on child elements
disabled.description_zh: 阻止点击 Popconfirm 子元素时弹出确认框

:icon.description_zh: 自定义弹出气泡 Icon 图标

showCancel.description: Whether to show the cancel button

:description.description: Detailed description of the confirmation content

:align.description: This value will be merged into placement's config, please refer to the settings dom-align
:align.description_zh: 该值将合并到 placement 的配置中，设置参考 dom-align

:arrow.description: Change arrow's visible state and whether the arrow is pointed at the center of target
:arrow.description_zh: 修改箭头的显示状态以及修改箭头是否指向目标元素中心

autoAdjustOverflow.description: Whether to automatically adjust position when the bubble is obscured
autoAdjustOverflow.description_zh: 气泡被遮挡时自动调整位置

defaultOpen.description: Whether the floating tooltip card is visible by default

destroyTooltipOnHide.description: Whether to destroy tooltip when hidden

fresh.description: By default, Tooltip caches content when closed. Setting this property will always keep it updated
fresh.description_zh: 默认情况下，Tooltip 在关闭时会缓存内容。设置该属性后会始终保持更新

:getPopupContainer.description: The parent node which the floating layer should be rendered to
:getPopupContainer.description_zh: 浮层渲染父节点，默认渲染到 body 上

:mouseEnterDelay.description: Delay in seconds before tooltip is shown on mouse enter
:mouseEnterDelay.description_zh: 鼠标移入后延时多少才显示 Tooltip，单位：秒

:mouseLeaveDelay.description: Delay in seconds before tooltip is hidden on mouse leave
:mouseLeaveDelay.description_zh: 鼠标移出后延时多少才隐藏 Tooltip，单位：秒

overlayClassName.description: Card class name (deprecated, please use classNames={{ root: '' }} instead)
overlayClassName.description_zh: 卡片类名, 请使用 classNames={{ root: '' }} 替换

:overlayStyle.description: Card style (deprecated, please use styles={{ root: {} }} instead)
:overlayStyle.description_zh: 卡片样式, 请使用 styles={{ root: {} }} 替换

:overlayInnerStyle.description: Card content area style (deprecated, please use styles={{ body: {} }} instead)
:overlayInnerStyle.description_zh: 卡片内容区域的样式对象, 请使用 styles={{ body: {} }} 替换

placement.description: The position of the tooltip relative to the target

:trigger.description_zh: 触发行为，可选 hover / focus / click / contextMenu，可使用数组设置多个触发行为

open.description: Whether the floating tooltip card is visible
open.description_zh: 用于手动控制浮层显隐

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

events.name: onCancel
events.description: Callback when Cancel button is clicked

events.name: onConfirm
events.description: Callback when OK button is clicked

events.name: onOpenChange
events.description: Callback when visibility of the tooltip card is changed

ButtonProps.name: loading
ButtonProps.description: Set the loading status of button
